protein.specific_function: Mediates activation of long-chain fatty acids for both synthesis of cellular lipids, and degradation via beta-oxidation. Able to activate long-chain fatty acids. Also able to activate very long-chain fatty acids; however, the relevance of such activity is unclear in vivo. Has increased ability to activate oleic and linoleic acid. May play a role in spermatogenesis.

reference.reference_text: Zheng Y, Zhou ZM, Min X, Li JM, Sha JH: Identification and characterization of the BGR-like gene with a potential role in human testicular development/spermatogenesis. Asian J Androl. 2005 Mar;7(1):21-32.
